name: scene_03
prompt:
cold high-tech near-futurist aesthetic, innovative corporate sci-fi atmosphere, clean metallic architecture, sharp volumetric light, symmetrical cinematic framing, minimalist advanced corridor. Continuation from the end of scene_02: frontal tracking shot, camera moving backward while the man runs toward the lens, maintaining centered composition. Audio: layered unintelligible office voices, distant ringing phones, subtle keyboard typing under the drone; soft holographic interface sweeps.

name: scene_04
prompt:
cold high-tech near-futurist aesthetic, innovative corporate sci-fi atmosphere, clean metallic architecture, sharp volumetric light, symmetrical cinematic framing, minimalist advanced corridor. Keep frontal view continuity from scene_03: camera still receding backward as he runs toward it. The ground liquefies into thick viscous pastel wax flowing backward in heavy waves; wide shot emphasizing the melting moving floor while he struggles to keep moving forward toward camera.
Audio: office chaos builds, low-frequency pressure rises, soft laser-like sweeps and digital glissandos cut through.

name: scene_05
prompt:
cold high-tech near-futurist aesthetic, innovative corporate sci-fi atmosphere, clean metallic architecture, sharp volumetric light, symmetrical cinematic framing, minimalist advanced corridor. Continue frontal tracking language: camera pulls back as he strugling runs toward it, then a large translucent clock appears above him; he jumps to reach it; it fragments into glowing particles; light explodes white while he lands and remains centered in front view.

name: scene_06
prompt:
cold high-tech near-futurist aesthetic, innovative corporate sci-fi atmosphere, clean metallic architecture, sharp volumetric light, symmetrical cinematic framing, minimalist advanced corridor. Keep frontal continuity from previous scene as his run decelerates; camera movement softens and settles while still facing him from the front. His tailored suit morphs smoothly into loose light flowing garments; shoes fade; he becomes barefoot; he slowly sits into lotus position.
Audio: calm airy ambience replaces tension, subtle fabric morph texture, softened drone.

name: scene_07
prompt:
cold high-tech near-futurist aesthetic, innovative corporate sci-fi atmosphere, clean metallic architecture, sharp volumetric light, symmetrical cinematic framing, minimalist advanced corridor. Audio: gentle harmonic swell and airy shimmer building into a soft overwhelming wash, ending in near silence.
